☐
                            
  Item 8.01  Other Events.  
                            
On June 1, 2020, Capital One Financial
Corporation (the “Company”) issued a press
release announcing that its subsidiaries
Capital One, N.A., and Capital One Bank (USA),
N.A. have commenced offers (the “Offers”) to
purchase for cash any and all of certain of
their securities from each registered holder.
A copy of the Company’s press release
announcing the commencement of the offers is
attached as Exhibit 99.1 to this Current
Report on Form 8-K.
